author: jeffghome2020
title: Cardano FIT - Africa
description: The NFL does not recruit talent from Africa. We want to create football training programs in Africa to provide youth with football training.
solution: We want to develop football programs that are given for free to countries to help train their youth to become professional football players.
experience: A former NFL player, a current Varsity player, A former military trainer and elite athletes all contributing to this program.
